ryad.games.ergoengine.components
Class PhysicsComponent

java.lang.Object
  ryad.games.ergoengine.GameComponent
      ryad.games.ergoengine.components.PhysicsComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener
public class PhysicsComponent
extends GameComponent

A basic physics component. Any object that uses this component, will be linked with the physics engine which will probably remain Box2D for the ErgoEngine.

Author:
xealgo
